attributes.action: Place a 220% import tariff on all Boeing built aircraft civilian and military.
attributes.background: It is only fair if the US are going to impose tariffs on our goods then we should on theirs.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you want the Government to introduce a tariff against Boeing-built aircraft only if there are tariffs on UK goods or whether you'd like a tariff whether or not there are tariffs on UK goods. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
